title: Fragment Item
description: Class which represents a Fragment, which is used for Decisioning

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: life cycle status
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: Status associated with fragment life cycle with in ExD.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: locale of fragment
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: Locale associated with the fragment (eg en_US, en, fr_FR, etc)

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: metadata of fragment
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: Metadata associated with the AJO Fragment which is stored/published at AJO (outside of ExD)

rawData.title: Raw data from fragment
rawData.description: Raw data from Fragment, which would be useful for offline ranking, etc

decisionAttributes.title: Decision Attributes
decisionAttributes.description: Dynamic attributes that can be subjected to decisioning based constructs like Rules, Ranking, Item Collection. Content rich fields (HTML / Text) are excluded here.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: External fragment
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: Fragment whose source of truth is outside of ExD

xdm:origin.title: origin
xdm:origin.description: Source of truth of fragments (for example AEM, other potential CMS providers)

xdm:status.title: status
xdm:status.description: Status as maintained by the external CMS like AEM ( new, draft, published, modified, unpublished), etc

xdm:extRefId.title: external reference Id
xdm:extRefId.description: Id as referenced in the external system

xdm:sourceInfo.title: source Info
xdm:sourceInfo.description: Source access Information (can vary based on systems)

xdm:modelInfo.title: model Info
xdm:modelInfo.description: Model or schema on which the fragment is based
